    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2143</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar exercises:Gerund and infinitive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik exercises:Gerund und Infinitiv</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grammaire exercises:Gerund et infinitif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gramática exercises:Gerund e infinitivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grammatica exercises:Gerund ed infinito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμματική exercises:Gerund και απαρέμφατο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gramática exercises:Gerund e infinitivo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are grammar exercies for matriculation English students on the topic of gerunds and infinitives</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gerunds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infinitives</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind Grammatik exercies für matriculation 
englische Kursteilnehmer auf dem Thema von Gerundien und von 
Infinitiven</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont des exercies de grammaire pour les 
étudiants anglais d'immatriculation sur le sujet des gérondifs et des 
infinitifs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes são exercies da gramática para estudantes 
ingleses do matriculation no tópico dos gerúndios e dos infinitivos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi sono exercies di grammatica per gli allievi 
inglesi di matriculation sul soggetto dei gerundi e degli infiniti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά είναι exercies γραμματικής για τους αγγλικούς 
σπουδαστές εγγραφής στο θέμα των γερουνδίων και των απαρεμφάτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstos son exercies de la gramática para los 
estudiantes ingleses del matriculation en el asunto de gerundios y de 
infinitivos</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
